enumtype.description: This enumeration defines the type of solr facets. The facet type determines behaviour of the facet filer. Refine: the typical drill down facet, where only one facet value can be selected within a facet. Multi-select allows multiple facet values to be selected within a facet. MultiSelectAnd: causes the multiple facet values to be ANDed together, where the product results must match all of the selected values. MultiSelectOr: causes the multiple facet values to be ORed together, where the product results must mach any of the selected values.
